Celestial Lightning.name: Celestial Lightning
Celestial Lightning.fullText:
Enlightened Word Attack 11Celestial Lightning

You call upon the red lightning that carved the will of the Celestial Heaven upon the cliffs of Tanghai to punish those who threaten your comrade.

Encounter        Divine, Lightning, Radiant, Runic, Weapon
Standard Action      Area burst 2 centered on an ally within 5 squares

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Strength vs. Fortitude

Hit: 2[W] + Strength modifier lightning and radiant damage.

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, the attacks of the ally on whom the burst was centered deal lightning and radiant damage, in addition to their normal types.

  Rune of Destruction: Until the end of your next turn, the ally also gains a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Strength modifier.

  Rune of Protection: Until the end of your next turn, the ally also gains a power bonus to his or her healing surge value equal to your Strength modifier.


Published in Dragon Magazine 404.
Celestial Lightning.flavor: You call upon the red lightning that carved the will of the Celestial Heaven upon the cliffs of Tanghai to punish those who threaten your comrade.
Celestial Lightning.range: Area burst 2 centered on an ally within 5 squares
Celestial Lightning.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier lightning and radiant damage.
Celestial Lightning.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the attacks of the ally on whom the burst was centered deal lightning and radiant damage, in addition to their normal types.
Celestial Lightning.runeOfDestruction: Until the end of your next turn, the ally also gains a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Strength modifier.
Celestial Lightning.runeOfProtection: Until the end of your next turn, the ally also gains a power bonus to his or her healing surge value equal to your Strength modifier.

Words of Celestial Heaven.name: Words of Celestial Heaven
Words of Celestial Heaven.fullText:
Enlightened Word Attack 20Words of Celestial Heaven

Your attack leaves your foe transfixed, as its life flashes before its eyes. When your enemy shakes off this effect, it tries to repent by turning on its former ally.

Daily        Divine, Lightning, Radiant, Weapon
Standard Action      Melee weapon

Target: One creature

Attack: Strength vs. AC

Hit: 3[W] + Strength modifier lightning and radiant damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).

  Aftereffect: The target makes a basic attack as a free action against one of its allies.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, your runepriest at-will attacks deal 5 extra lightning and radiant damage.


Published in Dragon Magazine 404.
Words of Celestial Heaven.flavor: Your attack leaves your foe transfixed, as its life flashes before its eyes. When your enemy shakes off this effect, it tries to repent by turning on its former ally.
Words of Celestial Heaven.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier lightning and radiant damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).
Words of Celestial Heaven.aftereffect: The target makes a basic attack as a free action against one of its allies.
Words of Celestial Heaven.effect: Until the end of the encounter, your runepriest at-will attacks deal 5 extra lightning and radiant damage.

Touch of Hope.name: Touch of Hope
Touch of Hope.fullText:
Enlightened Word Utility 12Touch of Hope

With a quick gesture, you trace the sign for “hope,” removing all afflictions from your ally.

Daily        Divine, Healing
Standard Action      Melee touch

Target: You or one ally

Effect: The target makes a saving throw against each effect on him or her that a save can end. The target also regains hit points equal to his or her healing surge value and can stand up as a free action.


Published in Dragon Magazine 404.
Touch of Hope.flavor: With a quick gesture, you trace the sign for “hope,” removing all afflictions from your ally.
Touch of Hope.effect: The target makes a saving throw against each effect on him or her that a save can end. The target also regains hit points equal to his or her healing surge value and can stand up as a free action.
